name: Photocopier Explosion
description:
Photocopier Explosion is an ancient Construct 2 game about a photocopier that explodes because of evil bad art and you gotta recover the 5 missing gears. Or something.

It was made for a game design class in middle school. I think I aced the assignment.
Here it is in its glory, except I replaced the music with music that I made because the original game used music from some sound pack I don't remember or know of, and I don't wanna get impaled by copyright for using music I don't know the creators of!

There's probably a bunch of bugs from compiling this game in the latest version of Construct 2. I don't know which version of Construct 2 this game was originally compiled in but I know it was pretty old. I think there's a bug with the lives counter but I'm not too keen on fixing up an game from middle school for any longer with a programming language I mostly forgot.

Most of the music comes from some of my old projects that didn't work out too well. The music will be uploaded on Youtube soon if I don't forget about it while I'm working on my far superior game Valleyway.
